Uses of Package
org.xlattice.corexml

  • Packages that use org.xlattice.corexml 
    Package Description
    org.xlattice.corexml
    This package provides the XML capability essential to XLattice.
    org.xlattice.corexml.bind
    This is a Java data binding facility.
    org.xlattice.corexml.expr
    Code to support the evaluation of various types of expressions, most importantly XPath.
    org.xlattice.corexml.om  
  • Classes in org.xlattice.corexml used by org.xlattice.corexml 
    Class and Description
    CoreXmlException
    Superclass of all exceptions thrown by CoreXml.
